TestCase.name: validateMultiJoinWithDependency
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[id, len, b, join_key2, category, pricegap, user_type]) StreamExecMultiJoinHTables(where=[...], join=[id, len, b, join_key2, join_key3, category, pricegap, nid3, user_type], joinType=[LeftJoin, LeftJoin, LeftJoin]) StreamExecCalc(select=[id, len, b, nid AS join_key, nid AS join_key2, nid AS join_key3]) StreamTableJoinHTable(where=[=(nid, rk_1)], join=[id, len, nid, rk_1, b], joinType=[InnerJoin]) StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: validateMultiJoin
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[id, len, b, join_key2, category, pricegap, user_type]) StreamExecMultiJoinHTables(where=[...], join=[id, len, b, join_key2, join_key3, category, pricegap, nid3, user_type], joinType=[LeftJoin, LeftJoin, LeftJoin]) StreamExecCalc(select=[id, len, b, nid AS join_key, nid AS join_key2, nid AS join_key3]) StreamTableJoinHTable(where=[=(nid, rk_1)], join=[id, len, nid, rk_1, b], joinType=[InnerJoin]) StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
